chapter.title: 遊戲
chapter.para: Ubuntu comes with 16 games by default, including Aisleriot Solitaire, Gnometris, and Mines.

sect1.title: Frozen-Bubble
sect1.para: 在 Frozen-Bubble，您要試著把相同顏色泡泡射擊掉且讓它們消失。

step.para: Install the frozen-bubble package from the Universe repository (see ).

To start Frozen-Bubble, choose
Applications Games Frozen-Bubble .

sect1.title: PlanetPenguin Racer
sect1.para: Tux 企鵝 － Linux 的吉祥物 － 在下雪以及被冰覆蓋的山快速滑行，碰到樹或者石頭會讓您減速。

note.para: Ensure you have hardware accelerated 3D drivers installed for your video card. For more information see .

step.para: Install the planetpenguin-racer package from the Universe repository (see ).

To start PlanetPenguin Racer, choose
Applications Games PlanetPenguin-Racer .

sect1.title: Scorched3D
sect1.para:
Scorched3D 是個焦土 3D 遊戲，一個互相火炮射擊遊戲。
Ensure you have hardware accelerated 3D drivers installed for your video card. For more information see .

step.para: Install the scorched3d package from the Universe repository (see ).

To start Scorched3D, choose
Applications Games scorched 3d .

sect1.title: 視窗遊戲
sect1.para: 許多視窗版本的遊戲能在 Linux 上透過模擬器執行。例子有Wine 和 Cedega

step.para: For information about Wine, see the Ubuntu wiki.
For information about Cedega, see the Ubuntu wiki
